title: Patch 5.3 Server Maintenance Announced

embed.title: Patch 5.3 Server Maintenance Announced
embed.description: The maintenance announcements are slowly rolling out for each region. If your region is not listed yet, don't panic.] Good news everyone - Server maintenance for our next patch, Patch 5.3, has been scheduled!

body:
Am morgigen Mittwoch wird am Morgen der Patch 5.3 aufgespielt.
Bereitet euch darauf vor und freut euch auf die schönen Änderungen :)

Lg
